details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.1.12 Document catalog dictionary - Version
details.description: If the Version key is present in the document catalog dictionary, the first character in its value shall be a 2 (32h) and the second character of its value shall be a PERIOD (2Eh) (decimal point). The third character shall be a decimal digit. The number of characters of the value of the Version key shall be exactly 3.

error.message: The Version key with value %1 does not match the pattern 2.n, where 'n' is a single digit number between 0 and 9.
